alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:20AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Otsego, southeastern Broome, western Delaware, southeastern Chenango, eastern Susquehanna and northwestern Wayne Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 119 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Guilford to near Sanford to near New Milford to Lake Carey. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Jackson, Guilford, Clifford, Sanford, Susquehanna, Forest City, Deposit, Susquehanna Depot and Harford. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 81 and 87A. Interstate 88 between 7 and 12. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 206 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
